pages.title: Spell Books
pages.text: $(key)Spell books$() can hold multiple spells. Use the $(mage/bind)Spell Binding Table$() to turn a book into an $(key)Apprentice Spell Book$(). Then, use $(mage/infusion)Enchantment Infusion$() to upgrade it.$(br2)$(bold)$(#cccc00)Lightning$() and $(bold)$(#3ea29f)Soul$() schools have no $(key)Apprentice Spell Book$(); craft a $(key)Primary Spell Book$() directly.

pages.title: Advanced Spell Books
pages.text: Higher-tier $(key)spell books$() provide more $(key)spell slots$().$(br2)You can put $(mage/scroll)spell scrolls$() into $(bold)Primary/Intermediate/Advanced$() $(key)Spell Books$() (similar to putting items into a bundle). The $(key)Apprentice Spell Book$() does not support this.
